Test the service with various native settings on an iOS device.

### Tasks

#### Large text

`Settings > Safari > Page Zoom`

- [ ] 200%

#### Invert colours

`Settings > Accessibility`

- [ ] Smart Invert

#### Greyscale

`Settings > Accessibility > Colour Filters`

- [ ] Greyscale
